amendment.description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds from being used for the acquisition of property for a new Federal Bureau of Investigation headquarters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 273, 1 Present (Roll no. 634).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 273, 1 Present (Roll no. 634).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
